features: 【What will you get】10 packs of 500 pieces transparent sticky notes, sufficient in quantity, enough to be used for a long time，Translucent sticky notes meet your various note-taking needs
【Safe and high-quality】made of high-quality PET material, smooth writing, waterproof, non-toxic, no peculiar smell; transparent design so that it will never hide any of your information
【Removable adhesive】is easy to paste or remove, and will not leave residue on the page, You can use a ballpoint pen to write text on transparent sticky notes without damaging the book
【Wide application】Self-adhesive waterproof memo is very suitable for offices, schools, and homes. It can be pasted on walls, desks, computers, books, diaries, catalogs, and documents
【Quality service】if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will spare no effort to help you within 24 hours
body.description: PRODUCT DETAILS: Transparent Sticky Note Pads - 500 Pcs Waterproof Self-adhesive Pad，Translucent Sticky Notes Suitable for Reading、Studying、 Home、Office、School，Sticks Securely，Removes Cleanly ►About us: BERKLIA is a professional supplier of Transparent sticky notes►About BERKLIA Transparent Sticky Notes:BERKLIA transparent sticky notes can easily edit documents without leaving traces on books, files, etc. It has a tracing paper function, which can help you draw and describe any image, bringing unlimited creativity. BERKLIA translucent sticky notes highlight important information in the book when taking notes, without writing directly on the book. Reposition, stick firmly, remove cleanly, leaving no residue.►Packing:10 packs of 500 pieces►Specifications:1. Size : 3 X 3 inches 2. Material: PET3. Color: translucent►Features:Waterproof, tear-resistant, smooth writing, self-adhesive, non-toxic and odorless►Seller’s Suggestion:1. Please use ballpoint pen and pencil2. Keep the sticky notes away from heating equipment and fire sources

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for school
reviews.reviewText: Honestly this is the best bang for your buck. You get so many for less than the post it brand (which doesn’t have nearly as many). I used them this last semester for my anatomy labs and love them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy, novel design
reviews.reviewText: My family loves sticky notes. They use them for recipes, calculations, notes in library books, etc. Very helpful things!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Student Studies with Clear Sticky Notes
reviews.reviewText: Each sticky note will stick well without damaging my textbooks. Easy to write on. Easy to move. Making notes/diagrams/other visual cues to review my notes and summarize with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars does a good job!
reviews.reviewText: amazing for taking notes, and doesn’t rip the paper when repositioning! it does smudge if you use markers, just be aware of what tools you use when annotating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite way to plan my math lessons!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These are one of my favorite products of all time as a teacher! I use these to make notes in my Teacher Guides when I lesson plan, and I’ve told so many teacher friends about them. I love that they are easy to write on (just beware what pen you use or it’ll smear), you can overlay text without compromising visibility, and they don’t damage pages when removed. This way I can make all the notes I want in my guides and if someone ever uses them after I do, I can easily remove my notes like they were never there.They are also great for notes on recipes, Bible studies, etc!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality material and performance
reviews.reviewText: This a review for the clear transparent sticky notes.A Platinum Preppy fountain pen and a Pilot gel pen write reasonably well on the surface of the note and the ink dries fast enough and I guess I could blot it if necessary.Combined with book darts, I can return to the spot where I was studying in a book. A book dart quickly gets me to the right page and can point to the line I was on. The sticky note can pinpoint the exact spot: I can underline where I stopped, and write notes that allow me to seamlessly pick up where I left off.Both the book dart and the sticky note can be reused and moved to new pages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Office supply geek
reviews.reviewText: I love these! Great for textbooks. I like writing notes on spreadsheets and other office docs. Shared some with a college student and she said they are cool. Loves them too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This has helped me prepare for my lessons as a teacher. I can write notes to myself as reminders or helpful tips. They peel off easy and don't leave any residue on my textbooks. I can also highlight and underline things in the book without leaving anything on the textbook.

Used this to annotate my beloved copy of Daughter of Smoke And Bone (it was an iconic part of my edgy childhood), and planning to use this to annotate more books. This supply of transparent sticky notes will set me up for a long while! I love the idea of annotating my books with my thoughts + feelings, but I don't want to actually write on the books themselves (it feels like vandalism). This was the perfect solution!Works with graphite pencil, coloured pencil, ballpoint pen, gel pen, and marker! Also works with posca, but you have to let it dry a fair bit first. Remember with ballpoint, gel pen and marker to leave it alone a bit before touching it, otherwise it will smudge. But with ballpoint I guess you could deliberately do that to "bold" your words :DWill stick for a long time. I wrote on one and stuck it on the wall since the day it arrived and it hasn't fallen off even after 2/3 weeks. I didn't even have to clean the wall beforehand like they say you have to do to stick stuff to it. Booyah!
These are great. I can make notes over things and still see the information beneath. It's great for adding to notes and reviewing for tests.

I bought these to annotate my books. After trying every pen in my apartment, the Posca paint pens seemed to work the best on them. Pencils, my black ballpoint pen and fine felt tip sharpie didn’t fare too well. Great price for the amount you get though, it came with 10 individual packs of 50 sticky notes (500 in total)
they are an amazing product but they come individually wrapped which is horrible for the environment
